name: Mogachess
description: This is a theme for Lichess intended for fans of the Monster Hunter license. Made with love by Gas.
additional_info:
V.0.1
The development of this theme is still in its infancy.
It is highly recommended to use a dark theme on Lichess and not to use the default chessboard. Instead, favor dark colors such as blue or gray chessboard. All this is very easily configured in the drop-down menus when you click on your player name.
Issues encountered: chess pieces are not displayed in the "Learn" category, which impacts lessons and problems.
